text: Kothuru Assembly constituency was a ST constituency of the Andhra Pradesh Legislative Assembly, India until 2008 in Srikakulam district. ==Overview== It was a part of the Srikakulam Lok Sabha constituency along with another six Vidhan Sabha segments, namely, Palasa, Tekkali, Pathapatnam, Srikakulam, Amadalavalasa and Narasannapeta. ==Members of Legislative Assembly== * 1951: * 1955: * 1962: * 1967: * 1972: * 1978: Viswasarai Narasimha Rao, Indian National Congress * 1983: Nimmaka Gopal Rao, Telugu Desam Party * 1985: Viswasarai Narasimha Rao, Indian National Congress * 1989: Nimmaka Gopal Rao, Telugu Desam Party * 1994: Nimmaka Gopal Rao, Telugu Desam Party * 1999: Nimmaka Gopal Rao, Telugu Desam Party * 2004: Janni Minathi Gomango Indian National Congress ==See also== * List of constituencies of Andhra Pradesh Legislative Assembly ==References== Category:Assembly constituencies of Srikakulam district Category:Assembly constituencies of Andhra Pradesh Category:Politics of Andhra Pradesh
title: Kothuru (ST) (Assembly constituency)
